documents.document: I feel like Russian mobsters in the movies are much more attractive than actual Russian mobsters
@boardchic I pretty much go through all of the world ready to jump on a chest and break some ribs.
@boardchic and both those have easy solutions: cpr + 911. Done.
@boardchic huh. I'm going with that you're delightfully neurotic. Did you or @stv order an entire half cow?
@boardchic where were you headed for dinner that you though that the end was indeed very nigh??
Got ID'd buying a $53 bottle of bourbon. The universe attempting to make up for the rest of the day?
Andrew Garfield and @StephenAtHome making out a little bit makes my bathing suit parts feel warm.
"Mama you look different. You look younger. It must have been the waxing." Thanks, boy child. Always with the slightly odd compliments
When you need OT. Don't want OT. Call in to say you're available hoping they don't need you. But they need you. Ah, damnit.
Round 2 of antibiotics! Because natural gut flora is soooo overrated.
Mmm, NyQuil. My sweet friend. Let's hand out and have a blissful sleep together.
You know you're tired when you haven't even had your pre-night shift nap yet, and you're already looking forward to going to bed tomorrow
Dinner of champions: watermelon and a biscotti. I'm healthy!!
Rage Against the Machine and slamming a tire with a sledgehammer can really soothe a soul.
Sometimes Thievery Corporation is the exact correct music to listen to.
Oooookay. Noping out of Cape Fear. How did I watch this before??
Watching Cape Fear for the first time since I was a teenager. Still scares the crap out of me.
Always weird when you're never sure if you fell asleep or not during your massage. #bliss
Night shift recovery sometimes requires pulling the snuggie out and napping in the la-z-boy while listening to The Doors.
Breakfast buffets show you the lowest form of humanity
Nothing like a fire alarm in the hotel to help you fall asleep (after having to carry 50+lbs of sleeping 6 y/o down 3 flights of stairs)
Sorry Anaheim, I came to your city and am present and cheering for your hockey team. So, you probably get to lose. Oops
*as children both walk away from husband in crowd* me: perhaps follow the tiny humans? The government doesn't like them wandering alone.
Wild and crazy night. I'm the last to fall asleep. It's 10:30. I think Disneyland beat us today
Those special family vacation moments of sitting in a dark room, with hopefully sleeping children, texting each other to communicate.
Boy child appears to be the thrill seeker that runs on adrenaline. Pure, animalistic roars on his first real roller coaster ride.
Why does no one even try cpr on people in british tv shows? She's lost consciousness for like 4 seconds.
Watching Benedict cumberbatch in a fight scene, knowing that in reality he would lose. #Sherlock
Got weird looks for making a reference to my quiet voice. It's quiet. That's just how it is.
Know what's good to throw into the antibiotics/ robaxacet mix? Fireball. I want to live here forever.
The one awkward thing with a onsie pyjama: when your belly button ring gets caught in the zipper 🙎🏼
Today I watch all things royal. Finished The Crown. Almost finished The Queen. God, I love it.
It would be interesting to see what my liver enzymes are like right now. There's been more meds in me in the last week than ever before.
The children have just learned about Pizza The Hut. My work here is almost done
First year in many that I'm not working nights on NYE. Also glad that I'm not spending the night in emerg because ribs aren't broken! Yay!
5 is determined to go to emerg. Last night, trying to shove a plastic hook in his ear. This morning, metal knitting needle into a socket.
Blonde Ambition. We all agree that this is Peak Madonna, right?
Ribs hurt so much from coughing that I'm fantasizing about abdominal binders and olde timey corsets.
Ah Christmas night... a time for Monty python followed up with trainspotting.
My best friend and I insisted the DJ at my wedding play multiple George Michael songs for us to dance to. One of my favourite times ever.
Nothing says Christmas like warming eggs in your crotch.
Nothing makes me happier in It's A Wonderful Life than Clarance telling George that Mary is an old maid "SHE'S CLOSING DOWN THE LIBRARY!"
@SnarkySteff AWESOME! Thanks for posting this! My Christmas Eve morning is even better now
Didn't realize the RT and I were going to have a coughing competition today. You're welcome, other coworkers!!
Post NyQuil morning grogginess is where I live now.
Where is that 12 yo in the crime stoppers ad getting a wad of cash to buy 100's of illegal smokes and a kilo of coke? That's the real ???
@CanadianKelli yes they do. That cyclist was just a dumb asshole
So much glitter on me. Thanks Christmas party. I'm sure I'll continue to find it in unexpected places for weeks
@bagheera79 @CanadianKelli the hope is that, if you're in my icu, you actually have a chance of recover.
@bagheera79 @CanadianKelli and sadly, that's when the ethics of quality vs quantity come into play.
@bagheera79 @CanadianKelli we do a lot of it, but to come to ICU, you usually require invasive tubes and lines to keep you alive.
@CanadianKelli 😢 luckily my icu tends to run younger. When I've seen people's toes fall off from levo, I don't think they've done well after
@CanadianKelli horrible. I wish people had more public education on what cpr does to a body. Snapping granny ribs is horrible.
Nothing like being goosed by a ginger.
@TransLink thanks!
Does the next bus feature on the @TransLink mobile website indicate actual departure time or scheduled departure time?
@boardchic not still. Again. I didn't even know anything had smashed in the living room in recent history.
How many times can a girl step on a piece of glass?!?!
When it's a week before Christmas and you are the only adult in the house. I mean, it's been at… https://t.co/zubDbiIWTh
@604Heather despite having watched Bridget less than a week ago, clearly I need to watch it again tonight.
@604Heather I want her flat in London
The blowing alley where 11's birthday party is smells of stale coffee and despair.
@604Heather maybe he needs to find a nice factory to warm up in.
@604Heather you're just helping him to understand the Dickensian era better. It's a history lesson, really
@604Heather it's far to late now. I already know I'll be crushed under the weight
3 girls coming to 11's birthday. 1 vegetarian. 1 gluten-free. There go the old standby of pizza and hotdogs. Fuck you, 2016.
No one told me that the gift your children give to your life is that of forever getting to scrape toothpaste off everything for eternity.
Oh, it might be happening. We might be getting there. #nyquil #thesleepiscoming
How long until the NyQuil kicks in? Is the game that I'm playing right now. I'm gonna sleep the start of this cold into oblivion
When you realize that you haven't seen daylight for 2 days. Ahh... that's why the murder.
It's an all 80's playlist in the OR today.
Hmm... going to nurse my pt in the OR. This should be interesting
Sometimes shaving your legs is so fucking satisfying.
Yes I'm in bed. Yes the toque is still on my head.
@Stv nothing to do with my shitty house being freezing at all 😋
Still wearing my toque. I've been inside my house for 4 hours now.
"When I was a child we used to suck on pennies, and honestly, it was a delight" Thank you, John Malkovich.
Ah winter. When one must tuck their phone in their bra to keep the battery alive.
Dental health is clearly the worst.
Total #assholeparent move today. By taking the kids to the dentist. 🙄
Hot yoga tonight essentially used my teen angst playlist and it made it 100x's better. Now to listen to Mazzy Star for sleepy time.
Creepy pistachio ad (why are they putting the image of elephants and squirrels in my head??) followed by creepy Johnny Depp ad *shudder*
That full moon gives me a sick and twisted desire to pick up a night shift in emerg.
Tangled the scarf in the earrings. I think that's a first. Thanks winter.
Will forever fantasize about having Bridget's London apartment for as long as I live.
Now it time for Bridget Jones. Because Christmas time means one must watch all Richard Curtis films.
Elf, Love Actually, Elf, Love Actually, Elf, Love Actually, etc, etc, etc
Pro tip: if you want my attention so you can try to sell me your wares, making kissy sounds at me won't work.
@CanadianKelli so I lied. My eyeballs and soft palate are soooo itchy and my sinuses are angry. What the fuck?!?!
Why yes, I am watching Love Actually again. I believe it's December, non?
"When you start yelling Beyoncé! You scare me"
@CanadianKelli soak it in mouth wash once a week
Thank you @WallCentre for taking pity on this post night shift nurse and letting me check in 8 hours early! Gonna have the best sleep
Flossed my teeth at work like the mutherfuckin badass I am
Is it wrong that when I see pictures of someone my age having their first baby, it makes me say gross and feel bad for them?
Glad to know that cabs in Calgary are just as horrifying as Vancouver. Who needs brakes and shocks? Silly.
@CanadianKelli I'm not really anymore. But I've had a sore,scratchy throat off and on. Fam have all been sick though...
Apparently I'm at hurt-your-hip-putting-on-compression-socks age. So that's exciting.
Being told that I live in non-fiction doesn't make me think that I'm going to get pulled into the upside down any less.
Seriously, @NVanDistrict salt? Any salt? My street is an ice patch where kids get dropped off for school. Why no salt?
